Activity: Start the day with some upbeat music and a cup of coffee! Check emails and prioritize tasks for the week. Scan news headlines on financial markets to stay informed - maybe a quick peek at Instagram for inspiration.

Review the legal and compliance feedback on the UHNWI client documentation received last week. Make a list of specific points to address. @PEOPLE: Email @legal-1 and @comp-1 to schedule a quick 15-minute chat about clarification on a couple of the feedback points regarding specific SEC regulations and UHNWI suitability.

Work on incorporating the legal and compliance feedback into the UHNWI client documentation. Focus on clarity and conciseness, making sure it's easy for clients to understand. Need to make it sound good, too! Think 'exclusive' and 'sophisticated'.
Lunch time! Head out for a quick bite with @mkt-1 and @ir-1 to chat about weekend plans and maybe brainstorm ideas for making the client presentations more engaging and less 'corporate-y'.
Continue drafting the UHNWI client documentation. Double-check all facts and figures to ensure accuracy. Run a grammar and spell check (gotta look professional!).
Email @pm-1 to schedule a brief meeting tomorrow to discuss the timeline for finalizing the client documentation and onboarding process. Need to make sure we're all on the same page.
Finish up the first draft of the UHNWI client documentation. Save it as a PDF and send it to @legal-1, @comp-1, and @ir-1 for final review. Quick scroll through TikTok before heading home.
